019package org.jgrapes.webconlet.oidclogin;
020
021import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException;
022import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonMappingException;
023import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
024import java.io.IOException;
025import java.net.HttpURLConnection;
026import java.net.MalformedURLException;
027import java.net.URI;
028import java.net.URISyntaxException;
029import java.net.URL;
030import java.nio.ByteBuffer;
031import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
032import java.security.SecureRandom;
033import java.time.Instant;
034import java.util.Arrays;
035import java.util.Base64;
036import java.util.Collections;
037import java.util.HashSet;
038import java.util.List;
039import java.util.Locale;
040import java.util.Map;
041import java.util.Optional;
042import java.util.TreeMap;
043import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
044import java.util.stream.Collectors;
045import org.jdrupes.httpcodec.protocols.http.HttpField;
046import org.jdrupes.httpcodec.protocols.http.HttpRequest;
047import org.jdrupes.httpcodec.protocols.http.HttpResponse;
048import org.jdrupes.httpcodec.types.MediaType;
049import org.jdrupes.httpcodec.types.ParameterizedValue;
050import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
051import org.jgrapes.core.ClassChannel;
052import org.jgrapes.core.Component;
053import org.jgrapes.core.Components;
054import org.jgrapes.core.Manager;
055import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler;
056import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.HandlerDefinition.ChannelReplacements;
057import org.jgrapes.core.events.Error;
058import org.jgrapes.http.ResponseCreationSupport;
059import org.jgrapes.http.annotation.RequestHandler;
060import org.jgrapes.http.events.HttpConnected;
061import org.jgrapes.http.events.Request;
062import org.jgrapes.http.events.Response;
063import org.jgrapes.io.IOSubchannel;
064import org.jgrapes.io.events.Input;
065import org.jgrapes.io.util.CharBufferWriter;
066import org.jgrapes.io.util.InputConsumer;
067import org.jgrapes.io.util.JsonReader;
068import org.jgrapes.io.util.events.DataInput;
069import org.jgrapes.util.events.ConfigurationUpdate;
070import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.ConsoleRole;
071import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.ConsoleUser;
072
073/**
074 * Helper component for {@link LoginConlet} that handles the
075 * communication with the OIDC provider.
076 */
077@SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis", "PMD.ExcessiveImports" })
078public class OidcClient extends Component {
079
080    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.FieldNamingConventions")
081    private static final SecureRandom secureRandom = new SecureRandom();
082    private Configuration config = new Configuration();
083    private final Map<String, Context> contexts = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
084
085    /** For channel replacement. */
086    private final class WebletChannel extends ClassChannel {
087    }
088
089    /**
090     * Instantiates a new OIDC client.
091     *
092     * @param requesterChannel the requester channel
093     * @param webletChannel the weblet channel
094     * @param redirectTarget the redirect target
095     * @param priority the handler's priority
096     */
097    public OidcClient(Channel requesterChannel, Channel webletChannel,
098            URI redirectTarget, int priority) {
099        super(requesterChannel, ChannelReplacements.create()
100            .add(WebletChannel.class, webletChannel));
101        RequestHandler.Evaluator.add(this, "onAuthCallback",
102            redirectTarget.toString(), priority);
103    }
104
105    /**
106     * The component can be configured with events that include
107     * a path (see @link {@link ConfigurationUpdate#paths()})
108     * that matches this components path (see {@link Manager#componentPath()}).
109     * 
110     * The following properties are recognized:
111     * 
112     * `clientId`
113     * : The client id as defined in the OIDC provider.
114     * `secret`
115     * : The secret as defined in the OIDC provider.
116     * `redirectUri`
117     * : The redirect URI as defined in the OIDC provider.
118     * 
119     * @param event the event
120     */
121    @Handler
122    public void onConfigUpdate(ConfigurationUpdate event) {
123        event.structured(componentPath()).ifPresent(m -> {
124            ObjectMapper mapper = new ObjectMapper();
125            config = mapper.convertValue(m, Configuration.class);
126        });
127    }
128
129    /**
130     * On start provider login.
131     *
132     * @param event the event
133     * @throws URISyntaxException 
134     */
135    @Handler
136    public void onStartProviderLogin(StartOidcLogin event)
137            throws URISyntaxException {
138        var providerData = event.provider();
139        if (providerData.authorizationEndpoint() != null
140            && providerData.tokenEndpoint() != null) {
141            attemptAuthorization(new Context(event));
142            return;
143        }
144        // Get configuration information first
145        fire(new Request.Out.Get(providerData.configurationEndpoint())
146            .setAssociated(this, new Context(event)));
147    }
148
149    /**
150     * Invoked when the connection to the provider has been established.
151     *
152     * @param event the event
153     * @param clientChannel the client channel
154     */
155    @Handler
156    public void onConnected(HttpConnected event, IOSubchannel clientChannel) {
157        // Transfer context from the request to the new subchannel.
158        event.request().associated(this, Context.class).ifPresent(c -> {
159            clientChannel.setAssociated(this, c);
160            // Also keep the request in order to dispatch responses
161            clientChannel.setAssociated(HttpRequest.class,
162                event.request().httpRequest());
163            // Send body if provided together with the request
164            event.request().associated(OutputSupplier.class)
165                .ifPresent(bp -> bp.emit(clientChannel));
166        });
167    }
168
169    /**
170     * Invoked when a response is received from the provider.
171     *
172     * @param response the response
173     * @param clientChannel the client channel
174     * @throws URISyntaxException 
175     */
176    @Handler
177    public void onResponse(Response response, IOSubchannel clientChannel)
178            throws URISyntaxException {
179        var optCtx = clientChannel.associated(this, Context.class);
180        if (optCtx.isEmpty()) {
181            return;
182        }
183        var rsp = (HttpResponse) response.response();
184        clientChannel.setAssociated(Response.class, response);
185        var reqUri
186            = clientChannel.associated(HttpRequest.class).get().requestUri();
187        if (rsp.statusCode() != HttpURLConnection.HTTP_OK) {
188            fire(new Error(response, "Attempt to access " + reqUri
189                + " returned " + rsp.statusCode()));
190        }
191        // All expected responses have a JSON payload (body), so
192        // wait for it and delay dispatching until the data is available.
193        if (rsp.hasPayload()) {
194            clientChannel.setAssociated(InputConsumer.class,
195                new JsonReader(Map.class, activeEventPipeline(), clientChannel)
196                    .charset(
197                        response.charset().orElse(StandardCharsets.UTF_8)));
198        }
199    }
200
201    /**
202     * Collect and process input from the provider.
203     *
204     * @param event the event
205     * @param clientChannel the client channel
206     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
207     */
208    @Handler
209    public void onInput(Input<ByteBuffer> event, IOSubchannel clientChannel)
210            throws IOException {
211        if (clientChannel.associated(this, Context.class).isEmpty()) {
212            return;
213        }
214        clientChannel.associated(InputConsumer.class).ifPresent(
215            ic -> ic.feed(event));
216    }
217
218    /**
219     * On data input.
220     *
221     * @param event the event
222     * @param clientChannel the client channel
223     * @throws MalformedURLException the malformed URL exception
224     * @throws URISyntaxException the URI syntax exception
225     * @throws JsonProcessingException 
226     * @throws JsonMappingException 
227     */
228    @Handler
229    public void onDataInput(DataInput<Map<String, Object>> event,
230            IOSubchannel clientChannel)
231            throws MalformedURLException, URISyntaxException,
232            JsonMappingException, JsonProcessingException {
233        var optCtx = clientChannel.associated(this, Context.class);
234        if (optCtx.isEmpty()) {
235            return;
236        }
237        if (clientChannel.associated(Response.class)
238            .map(r -> (HttpResponse) r.response())
239            .map(r -> r.statusCode() != HttpURLConnection.HTTP_OK)
240            .orElse(true)) {
241            // Already handled in onResponse, log details
242            Response evt = clientChannel.associated(Response.class).get();
243            logger.finer(() -> "Payload of failed event "
244                + Components.objectName(evt) + ": " + event.data().toString());
245            return;
246        }
247        var provider = optCtx.get().startEvent.provider();
248        // Dispatch based on information from the request URI
249        var reqUri
250            = clientChannel.associated(HttpRequest.class).get().requestUri();
251        if (reqUri.equals(provider.configurationEndpoint().toURI())) {
252            processConfigurationData(event, optCtx.get(), provider);
253        } else if (reqUri.equals(provider.tokenEndpoint().toURI())) {
254            processTokenResponse(event, optCtx.get(), provider);
255        }
256    }
257
258    private void processConfigurationData(DataInput<Map<String, Object>> event,
259            Context ctx, OidcProviderData provider)
260            throws MalformedURLException, URISyntaxException {
261        String aep = (String) event.data().get("authorization_endpoint");
262        if (aep != null) {
263            provider.setAuthorizationEndpoint(new URL(aep));
264        }
265        String tep = (String) event.data().get("token_endpoint");
266        if (tep != null) {
267            provider.setTokenEndpoint(new URL(tep));
268        }
269        String uiep = (String) event.data().get("userinfo_endpoint");
270        if (uiep != null) {
271            provider.setUserinfoEndpoint(new URL(uiep));
272        }
273        String issuer = (String) event.data().get("issuer");
274        if (issuer != null) {
275            provider.setIssuer(new URL(issuer));
276        }
277
278        // We only get the configuration information as part of a login
279        // process, so continue with the login now.
280        attemptAuthorization(ctx);
281    }
282
283    private void attemptAuthorization(Context ctx)
284            throws URISyntaxException {
285        @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseConcurrentHashMap")
286        Map<String, String> params = new TreeMap<>();
287        params.put("scope", "openid");
288        params.put("response_type", "code");
289        params.put("client_id", ctx.startEvent.provider().clientId());
290        params.put("redirect_uri", config.redirectUri);
291        params.put("prompt", "login");
292        if (ctx.startEvent.locales().length > 0) {
293            params.put("ui_locales", Arrays.stream(ctx.startEvent.locales())
294                .map(Locale::toLanguageTag).collect(Collectors.joining(" ")));
295        }
296        var stateBytes = new byte[16];
297        secureRandom.nextBytes(stateBytes);
298        var state = Base64.getEncoder().encodeToString(stateBytes);
299        params.put("state", state);
300        var request = HttpRequest.replaceQuery(
301            ctx.startEvent.provider().authorizationEndpoint().toURI(),
302            HttpRequest.simpleWwwFormUrlencode(params));
303        logger.finer(() -> "Getting " + request);
304        contexts.put(state, ctx);
305        fire(new OpenLoginWindow(ctx.startEvent, request));
306    }
307
308    /**
309     * On callback from the authorization request. (Path selector
310     * defined in constructor.)
311     *
312     * @param event the event
313     * @param channel the channel
314     */
315    @RequestHandler(channels = WebletChannel.class, dynamic = true)
316    public void onAuthCallback(Request.In.Get event, IOSubchannel channel) {
317        ResponseCreationSupport.sendStaticContent(event, channel,
318            path -> getClass().getResource("CloseWindow.html"), null);
319        var query = event.httpRequest().queryData();
320        var ctx = Optional.ofNullable(query.get("state"))
321            .orElse(Collections.emptyList()).stream().findFirst()
322            .map(contexts::get).orElse(null);
323        if (ctx == null) {
324            return;
325        }
326        ctx.code = query.get("code").get(0);
327
328        // Prepare token request
329        OidcProviderData provider = ctx.startEvent.provider();
330        Request.Out.Post post = new Request.Out.Post(provider.tokenEndpoint());
331        post.httpRequest().setField(HttpField.CONTENT_TYPE,
332            new MediaType("application", "x-www-form-urlencoded"));
333        post.httpRequest().setField(HttpField.AUTHORIZATION,
334            new ParameterizedValue<>("Basic "
335                + Base64.getEncoder().encodeToString(
336                    (provider.clientId() + ":" + provider.secret())
337                        .getBytes())));
338        post.httpRequest().setHasPayload(true);
339
340        // Prepare payload data
341        var params = new TreeMap<String, String>();
342        params.put("grant_type", "authorization_code");
343        params.put("code", ctx.code);
344        params.put("redirect_uri", config.redirectUri);
345        @SuppressWarnings("resource")
346        OutputSupplier body = (IOSubchannel c) -> {
347            new CharBufferWriter(c, activeEventPipeline())
348                .append(HttpRequest.simpleWwwFormUrlencode(params)).close();
349        };
350        fire(post.setAssociated(OutputSupplier.class, body).setAssociated(this,
351            ctx));
352        event.setResult(true);
353    }
354
355    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
356    private void processTokenResponse(DataInput<Map<String, Object>> event,
357            Context ctx, OidcProviderData provider) {
358        ctx.idToken = JsonWebToken.parse((String) event.data().get("id_token"));
359        var idData = ctx.idToken.payload();
360
361        // Mandatory checks, see
362        // https://openid.net/specs/openid-connect-core-1_0.html#IDTokenValidation
363        if (provider.issuer() != null
364            && !provider.issuer().toString().equals(idData.get("iss"))) {
365            fire(new OidcError(ctx.startEvent, "ID token has invalid issuer."));
366        }
367        if (idData.get("aud") instanceof List auds && !auds.contains(
368            provider.clientId())
369            || idData.get("aud") instanceof String aud
370                && !aud.equals(provider.clientId())) {
371            fire(new OidcError(ctx.startEvent,
372                "ID token has invalid audience."));
373        }
374        if (idData.get("exp") instanceof String exp
375            && !Instant.now()
376                .isBefore(Instant.ofEpochSecond(Long.valueOf(exp)))) {
377            fire(new OidcError(ctx.startEvent, "ID token has expired."));
378        }
379        if (!idData.containsKey("preferred_username")) {
380            fire(new OidcError(ctx.startEvent,
381                "ID token does not contain preferred_username."));
382        }
383
384        // Success
385        var user = new ConsoleUser((String) idData.get("preferred_username"),
386            Optional.ofNullable((String) idData.get("name"))
387                .orElse((String) idData.get("preferred_username")));
388        var roles = new HashSet<ConsoleRole>();
389        for (var role : (List<String>) idData.get("roles")) {
390            roles.add(new ConsoleRole(role));
391        }
392        fire(new OidcUserAuthenticated(ctx.startEvent, user, roles));
393    }
394
395    /**
396     * The configuration information.
397     */
398    public static class Configuration {
399        public String redirectUri;
400    }
401
402    /**
403     * The context information.
404     */
405    private class Context {
406        public final StartOidcLogin startEvent;
407        public String code;
408        public JsonWebToken idToken;
409
410        /**
411         * Instantiates a new context.
412         *
413         * @param startEvent the start event
414         */
415        public Context(StartOidcLogin startEvent) {
416            super();
417            this.startEvent = startEvent;
418        }
419    }
420
421}
